Game.Name: Cross Fire (USA)
Game.plot: Crossfire was actually a reskinned version of the Super Airwolf video game for the Genesis. Elements from the Airwolf license have been removed or modified such as the Airwolf theme music that would play during the vertical helicopter shooting segments as well as the commander who gave the player instructions. Gameplay, levels, and weapon upgrades remained the same.Cheat: Cheat CodesAt the menu select screen, press one of the following for the desired affect. Only one code can be used at a time.
Game.Developer: Kyugo of America, Inc., Kyugo Trading Co., Ltd
Game.Notes: Fly a helicopter into hostile territory to rescue hostages and make some money on the side. The places the player can choose to fly into are Guatemara (Engrish for Guatemala), Cuba, and Panama. Missions are broken down into three different parts. The first part involves flying a helicopter taking out various enemies. The second part has the player flying a super helicopter into the enemies base. The third part has the player taking control of a soldier on the ground taking out enemies in the base. While on the ground, the player can call in help from the copter only for a limited number of times. Also while on the ground the player can rescue hostages.
